titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in high court of Parliament: the humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common Councell assembled. With the answer of the Lords and Commons to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes printer to the Honourable City of London.,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of final leaf.
"That the King should take the Covenant and the army be disbanded"--Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
